Methodologies: Enzymatic quantitation using pyranose oxidase, colorimetry with peroxidase, glucose removal via hexokinase and pyruvate kinase pretreatment
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Diazyme 1,5-AG enzymatic assay for quantitation of 1,5-anhydroglucitol in serum and plasma to monitor glycemic control in diabetes
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of 1,5-anhydroglucitol in serum or plasma for intermediate term (1-2 weeks) glycemic control monitoring in people with diabetes; for in vitro diagnostic use only
